item.title: Ray-Cylinder intersection
item.description: For a given cylinder with radius $R$ and height $H$, a ray with origin $P$ and direction $RD$, find the first intersection point $P'$ between the ray and the cylinder. First, I will simplify the problem by flatening the ray (so effectively this becomes a 2D problem). You can understand this as trying to figure out the intersection point between the ray and a slice of the cylinder. $C$ is the slice center: $(Cylinder_x, P_y, Cylinder_z)$
